titles.title: AMT Relief Extension Act of 2009
AMT Relief Extension Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend relief from the alternative minimum tax.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: AMT Relief Extension Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase the exemption from the alternative minimum tax for individual taxpayers in 2009; and (2) extend through 2009 the allowance of certain nonrefundable tax credits against alternative minimum tax liability.
